title: TinyGap
text:
Hello, friends! Hao here, the dude behind TinyGap Handyman Services. I’m your guy for all the home reno needs around Didcot. Need some slick new floors laid down? I got you. Patio looking drab? Let’s pimp that space. Got a vision for some sweet custom woodwork? I’ll make it happen. Or just tryna freshen things up with a new coat of paint? Say no more.
Check out my portfolio to see some of my past projects - that’ll give you an idea of the fire I’m working with. I’m always down for some free quotes, so hit me up whenever and let me know what you’re trying to get done. We’ll get that project handled and have your place looking amazing! Let’s get this reno party started!

title: Built-in Cabinets
text:
Hey friend, just to let you know I’ve gotten pretty handy at building custom cabinets and those slick floating shelves. They’re such a great solution for opening up some space and giving your place a modern refresh. Check out these photos of some recent projects I’ve knocked out. If you’ve been kicking around ideas for revamping your space, hit me up and we can make it happen. No pressure, just thought I’d put that out there since I know how much you love home improvement projects!

title: Flooring
text:
Hey! You know I’ve got some solid experience installing laminate flooring. I’m pretty meticulous about the details, so you can count on the finished product looking sharp. Check out these photos of some recent projects I’ve wrapped up. If you’re tired of that old nasty carpet and want to swap it out for some easy-to-maintain laminate, just give me a shout. We can catch up over a beer and I can walk you through the whole process. No pressure, just thought I’d put it out there since I know how much you hate that carpet!

title: Garden Projects
text:
Hey, you know gardening itself isn’t really my forte, but if you’ve got any woodworking projects lined up for the yard, I’m absolutely your man! Need some new fence posts put in? I can tackle that no problem. Been wanting to build a shed for all your gardening tools and supplies? That’s right up my alley. Or maybe you’re looking to add a nice garden gate for a little curb appeal? I’d be happy to help bring your vision to life. Don’t hesitate to run any outdoor carpentry projects by me. I’m always down to lend a hand for friends whenever I can!

title: General Home Improvements
text:
Hey, along with the custom woodwork stuff, I’ve got you covered for all sorts of general home improvement projects too. Need some new floor tiles laid down? I’m your guy. Looking to get one of those slick IKEA kitchens installed? I can handle that without a problem. Or maybe you just want to freshen a room up with a new paint job? Consider it done! Just let me know what you’ve got in mind and I’ll make sure we knock it out of the park. Always down to help out friends with whatever projects you’ve got cookin’!

title: Handmade furniture
text:
You know, I may not have any official furniture-making training under my belt, but I’ve definitely gotten my hands dirty crafting up some pretty intricate pieces over the years that I’m really proud of. If you’ve been kicking around ideas for some custom furniture to spruce up your place, I’d be more than happy to hear you out! Don’t hesitate to run those visions by me - I’m always game to flex my woodworking muscles on unique projects like that for friends. Who knows, maybe we can collaborate and I can help bring your furniture dreams to life in a way that really speaks to your style. Just let me know what you’ve been thinking!
